name: Python Developer
description:
ADBRO was founded in 2014 and now has a successful partnership with the largets advertisers and media holdings of the Asia region. Headquarters are located in Vietnam and sales offices are located in Malaysia, Singapore and Indonesia. Guys were always convinced that the most talented developers are in Russia so that is why the dev team is in Moscow, although there are some people working remotely from Saint Petersburg, Cheboksary and Saratov. Recently the company has approved in-image advertisement model, so now they are actively gathering people for updating advertising platform.

We are looking for who Python Developer would be responsible for developing inner client portal for advertisers.


Must-have skills:

Experience with Python and Django 2+ years (Python 3 is a plus)

Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL Databases

Nive-to-have skills:

Experience with highload systems

Knowledge of AWS or other cloud technologies
